channel.title: Client Help and another Question
channel.description:
[b]On a Client i got its Premade but i did the rest
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2v8ohud.jpg[/img]
How do i change that..? and the other question is
How do i change what the Client says when you log in inside the chatscreen it will say Welcome to afwdfasd saefsd [/b]

item.title: Client Help and another Question
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

hey i went into EGUI.java because there isnt a GUI and i didnt see anything like it all thats in there is this.

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“5.223.244.95”, “5.223.244.95”, “5.223.244.95”
});
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help and another Question
item.dc:creator: @Daikenkai Daikenkai
item.description:
@Daikenkai wrote:

For the first question, go into your GUI or EGUI.java (i think) and and search the name of your client. You might see several of them, but just change the right one to the name you want.

For the second question, go into your client.java and search for what it says when you log in. You should find it, and then delete the whole message or change it to what you want it to say.

At least that is how it was done in my client.

Also, this is the wrong section, this should go in client help, but no worries ^.^

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
